alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 18 at 8:50AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Georgia, including the following county, Lowndes. * WHEN...Until 945 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 850 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Dasher, I-75 At Exit 11, Valdosta Regional Airport, Twin Lakes and I-75 At Exit 5. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
